kw.name: Make a POST API Request with
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Create Custom Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Custom Authenticated Session using : alias=API_POST, url=http://localhost:8080/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Post Request
kw.doc: Send a POST request on the session object found using the given `alias`

kw.name: Log Many
kw.doc: Logs the given messages as separate entries using the INFO level.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Verify the API Response Code is
Log
kw.arg:
Actual Response Status Code: ${API_RESPONSE.status_code}
Expected Response Status Code: ${expected_status_code}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg:
Actual Response Status Code: 202
Expected Response Status Code: 202

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: TC_3: Upload records of working class hero using CSV

kw.name: Navigate to Oppenheimer Project
kw.doc: Navigate to the Oppenheimer Project page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Upload File
kw.doc: Pass xpath(xpath should be related to input tag not button) and path of file

kw.name: Normalize Path
kw.doc: Normalizes the given path.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into the file input field ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: uploading CSV file on UI page

test.name: TC_5: Dispense tax relief for working class heroes

kw.name: Navigate to Oppenheimer Project
kw.doc: Navigate to the Oppenheimer Project page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class= 'btn btn-danger btn-block']' contains exact text 'Dispense Now'.

kw.name: Dispense taxRelief
kw.doc: Dispense tax relief for working class heroes

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class='display-4 font-weight-bold']' contains exact text 'Cash dispensed'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case can Dispense tax relief for working class heroes
